features: MID-CENTURY MODERN: Blending together iconic splayed legs with beautifully tufted upholstery, our club chair offers a mid-century look to your lounge space. With its clean lines and understated look, this chair uses new materials to reimagine a traditional design. Seat height: 17.75 inches

TUFTED WAFFLE STITCH: The tufted stitching in the seating offers an extra touch of sophistication that enhances its contemporary design. The waffle stitch pattern adds a bit of texture without sacrificing any comfort.

BIRCH WOOD LEGS: This chair is supported by beautifully tapered birch wood legs which offer an attractive look and durable structure. Its fine grain takes stains well, giving this piece a gorgeous finish.

DIMENSIONS: Choose an accessory that is the perfect size for you and your furniture. This club chair is 30.50" W x 31.50" D x 32.50" H. You will love how much your space can transform with the simple addition of this charming living room set.
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Some assembly is required for this club chair. All of the instructions and tools needed for assembly are included.
body.description: Welcome home an exceptionally crafted piece of furniture that stands firm in its style. Perfectly balancing tufted waffle stitching with tapered birch wood legs, our club chair offers your home a charming mid-century modern upgrade. Offering a perfect space to curl up with a blanket and favorite book, our beautifully upholstered chair will effortlessly transform your decor. This piece combines a classic look with a striking twist to create a chair that will bring a refreshing atmosphere for you to enjoy. Includes: One (1) Club ChairMaterial: FabricLeg Material: Birch WoodMultiple Color OptionsLeg Color: WalnutAssembly RequiredDimensions: 31.50 inches deep x 30.50 inches wide x 32.50 inches highSeat Dimensions: 21.50 inches deep x 21.50 inches wide x 17.75 inches highWeight Capacity: 300 lbsArm Height: 22.50 inches.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ergonomic Design This chair with slightly curved backrest and armrest fit perfectly on your back and arm for the most comfortable enjoyment.

Tufted Waffle Stitc Tufted furniture is simply more comfortable than many alternative designs. The cushions remain plush and plump without needing to be constantly readjusted. Highly Elastic Foam Filled with high resilience foam, this soft cushion not only increases flexibility, but also is not easy to deform. Solid Wood Legs This chair is supported by beautifully turned pine wood legs which offer an durable structure and attractive look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Back support is hard, not soft
reviews.reviewText: Changed my mind:Initially I thought the back support wasn’t good. But I put a nice cushion on top and an otoman to pair with, and I just don’t want to get out of this chair.Back support was decent and sturdy enough that I don’t get a back pain while sitting down. I bought of these chairs and they look good together with a nice side table. My guests also like the chair.Overall easy to put together and pretty to look at. But the back support is not good - it is not soft so its pushing against your back. Since the middle part of the back support is protruding out, all of the pressures are put on your mid-back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable!! So Worth!!! buying
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, Very durable and super comfortable. It has replaced my bed!! Lol I have been sleeping on this comfortable chair for a while now. Yes I come home tired from work but as soon as I sit on this 20 mins in I'm out and get a very comfortable sleep, my muscles don't even hurt when I wake up. My feet hurt from putting them on top of things so I can stretch out while I sleep here. That's how comfortable this chair is!! I actually want to stay in it and sleep as much as I can. I found a soft stool to pit my feet up while I sleep. I also use this as my Footbal watching char and my Gaming chair. I was skeptical buying furniture from Amazon but this was a homerun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but comfy
reviews.reviewText: This chair is smaller than I expected- even though I measured the chair I was replacing and compared to the stats listed it is still smaller than I thought- however it’s a nice chair- especially for the price- I wish the arms and back came up a bit higher and the seat were a bit wider but overall I like it- Super easy to put together- I did it myself without help in prob 20 min- I like the color and it’s comfortable- and it looks good in the space- it certainly shipped and arrived fast and it was well packed- overall I would recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very nice additional chair for our living room. It's a smaller space and this fits nicely without being so small that no one can sit in it. Not overly comfortable, but perfectly nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great chair for the price. Easy to assemble. Comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad. But not great.
reviews.reviewText: The chair itself is a great color, the fabric is nice, and the cushions are firm but comfortable. However. The instruction sheet was missing pages 2 and 3 - page 4 was printed on the flip aide of page 1. The bolt that is supposed to connect the back to the base is too short, and the chair itself is slightly shorter than what was advertised.For an Amazon Prime Day special I’m not mad about it. But I’m not thrilled either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It goes great with the decor, and great for all I bought it for. Reading, dressing etc.Easy to assemble, just the right color !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Firm, all 4 legs were chipped, feels like low quuality
reviews.reviewText: Arrived today, easy to assemble, all 4 legs had chips in them and it's very firm. Grey is more blue than Grey IMO. The side pieces on the back look odd to me.
